name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Cheese Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Spaghetti pasta with a creamy egg and cheese sauce, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken in a spiced tomato and cream sauce served with rice.

name: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of fresh sushi including nigiri and rolls.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Mixed vegetables stir-fried with tofu in a savory sauce.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Grilled salmon fillet served with steamed vegetables and rice.

name: Greek Gyro
description: Pita bread filled with seasoned lamb, lettuce, tomato, and tzatziki sauce.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Slow-cooked pork ribs with a smoky barbecue sauce.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake with a creamy chocolate frosting.
